subject: Sponsorship Deck
description_text:
Hi,

Thanks again for getting back to me on Instagram. I’ve attached my Sponsorship Deck for you to have a look at — I’d be really excited about the opportunity to work with you and your team.

I’d love to hear your thoughts when you’ve had a chance to review.

Best regards,
Ozzy

conversations.body_text: Hello, we are very interested in this. Please let me know the specific details of the plan.

Hi,

I’m glad that you’re interested in the plan. Here’s a clear breakdown of my sponsorship packages:

Headline Sponsor – £4,000/month
Intro/outro mention in every video (spoken or in description, daily uploads)
One dedicated feature video per month
Tagged in every post caption
Coverage across all platforms
Ideal for brands wanting maximum visibility and daily exposure across a highly engaged automotive audience.

Feature Partner – £2,500/month
Prominent logo placement inside videos (watermark/graphic)
One dedicated post per month
One casual mention per month in another post
Coverage across all platforms
Perfect for brands looking for consistent visibility without the full commitment of headline sponsorship.

Supporting Sponsor – £1,000/month
Logo/brand name at the end of videos/reels
One dedicated post per quarter
One shoutout per quarter
Coverage across all platforms
A great entry-level option to get your brand seen regularly and start building recognition with the audience.

Bio Sponsor
£1,000/month → for one platform (e.g. Instagram bio only)
£2,000/month → for all bios (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, Threads)
Constant presence on profiles ensures visibility every time someone visits my pages, making this an always-on brand placement.

Commitments & Terms
Minimum commitment: 3 months
Content is delivered in line with my regular posting schedule (daily uploads + dedicated posts as outlined above)
Payment terms: monthly in advance

Do let me know what your thoughts are.

Thanks,
Ozzy

>
